snippet: John Lutz, the "30 Rock" co-star, is working with Jamil Zaki, an assistant professor of psychology at Stanford University, on a new book that subjects him to a series of social experiments.
abstract: John Lutz, the "30 Rock" co-star, is working with Jamil Zaki, an assistant professor of psychology at Stanford University, on a new book that subjects him to a series of social experiments.

headline.main: A '30 Rock' Player Sells Himself to Science for 'The Lutz Experiment'
headline.print_headline: John Lutz to Become A ‘Lab Rat’ for a Book
